title: The Tides That Bind: Inside Alabama Football
overview: A documentary series offering an intimate look at University of Alabama football during the transformative 2024 season. With Coach Kalen DeBoer stepping in after Nick Saban's legendary tenure, the series explores the core values that shape players into champions. More than just about wins and losses, it delves into athletic, academic, and spiritual growth, capturing the deep connections that bind the team, its community, and the enduring legacy of Crimson Tide football.
